subject: Baseball
Demonstrations, Protests and Riots
lead_paragraph: Every game in the history of Major League Baseball has been open to fans. On Wednesday, that will change as the Orioles play the White Sox with no fans admitted to Camden Yards.
snippet: Every game in the history of Major League Baseball has been open to fans. On Wednesday, that will change as the Orioles play the White Sox with no fans admitted to Camden Yards.
